aboutPage.aboutText1: You can find statistics of confirmed, deaths and recovered COVID-19 cases in this application for every day since 22/01/2020.
aboutPage.aboutText2: The application data is updated daily.
aboutPage.creditText: This application uses the data provided by JHU CSSE.

aboutPage.aboutText1: 22/01/2020 tarihinden beri olan COVID-19 vaka, iyileşme ve vefat istatistiklerini bu uygulamadan takip edebilirsiniz.
